title: REC disburses Rs 90,955 cr as loan in April-June
description: State-owned REC has disbursed Rs 90,955 crore in loans during April-September FY25, marking a 20.10% increase from the previous year. Notably, green loans surged by 92.68% year-on-year to Rs 11,297 crore. Renewable energy loans reached Rs 5,946 crore in the September quarter, a 37.35% rise from the previous year.
